title: Getting involved
body: How can anyone get involved with Adapt?

_items.text: Sign up to the community site

_feedback.correct: That's correct. There are multiple ways of getting involved with Adapt. However signing up to the community site is the best way to see discussions, news and feature requests.

_incorrect.notFinal: That's not correct. All three answers are correct - There are multiple ways of getting involved with Adapt. However signing up to the community site is the best way to see discussions, news and feature requests.
_incorrect.final: Final feedback! That's not correct. All three answers are correct - There are multiple ways of getting involved with Adapt. However signing up to the community site is the best way to see discussions, news and feature requests.

_partlyCorrect.notFinal: Not quite correct. Actually it's all three answers - There are multiple ways of getting involved with Adapt. However signing up to the community site is the best way to see discussions, news and feature requests.
_partlyCorrect.final: Final feedback! Not quite correct. Actually it's all three answers - There are multiple ways of getting involved with Adapt. However signing up to the community site is the best way to see discussions, news and feature requests.
